main event: On May 9, 1967, a civilian reported observing an oval-shaped object in East Memphis, Tennessee, that changed color and was the length of approximately six cars.
interesting points: The object changed color from orange-red to darker hues., Observers stated the object was very large and low in the sky., There were several reports of similar sightings in the area., An extremely bright light was emitted from the bottom of the object that resembled the sun., The object seemed to move silently and was visible for about 15 minutes.
witness description: reliable but shaken, both experienced unusual sightings before.
